events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and I want to return it because it doesn't fit me well, please help me with the refund process.
The customer reported a return and refund request for an incorrect size of a jacket purchased recently.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah for handling the refund request related to the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your jacket return and refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you'd like to return the jacket to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is too tight around the shoulders, so I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket within 14 days. We'll cover the return shipping and will refund your payment once we receive the item.
That sounds great, thank you! I will send it back tomorrow and appreciate your quick help.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. You should see the amount reflected in your bank account within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to ensure you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since you have confirmed the refund, we are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your customer service experience with this refund process.
